name: Magons
description:
Magons is about a Mage and Dimensions, use your perception of reality powers to move,  grow or shrink (arrrow keys)  with an extra rule: Less scale is More distance, only enemies in your dimensions (same scale) can touch you, be cautios, some enemies might trick you...  (Created in 1 week for the ythird BlackThonProd game jam)

- Observations:

Since I had only 1 week I didn't have time to polish and solve a few problems with the configurations:

1- there is no mute button (you can turn your computer audio off if you want)

2- there  is only fullscreen.

3- there is no pause button.

4 - after winning you must exit with "ESC"

...And remember that this is my first game, thanks.

 I'm still training making sounds, so can you recommend good audio apps for pc in the comments, please?
